name: Ghost Town 64: Ghost Wrangler
description:
Ghost Town 64
for LowRezJam 2019
Blaine Hodge @nullterm

Throw your rope at ghosts to pull them onto the trap. But watch out, if they hit you they take a life away.

Controls
arrow keys - move and turn
space - throw ghost trap or rope
double tap arrow keys - dodge left or right

Click the window to focus for audio.

https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2019
